name: Carrotting Brain
description: It is a cartoon-style arena shooter with rabbits destroying planets. The game has exceptionally realistic physics and ballistics. The weapons and the environment itself give you a ridiculous number of ways to devastate your enemy. It's designed to be played with your friends on a big screen.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i5 @ 2.4 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: ATI Mobility Radeon HD 540v DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: ATI High Definition Audio Device
